articles.title: Justice Department Told Trump in May That His Name Is Among Many in the Epstein Files
articles.description: The Wall Street Journal reports that the Justice Department informed President Trump in May that his name appeared in numerous files related to Jeffrey Epstein.

articles.title: Bryan Kohberger Receives Four Consecutive Life Sentences for 2022 Murders
articles.description: Bryan Kohberger has been sentenced to four consecutive life terms without the possibility of parole, plus 10 years, for the murders of four university students in 2022.

articles.title: Trump Unveils America's AI Action Plan and Launches AI.gov
articles.description: President Trump has unveiled a comprehensive AI Action Plan and launched AI.gov, aiming to position the United States as a global leader in artificial intelligence.
